scores.translation_reasoning: All PRD requirements converted to actionable stories with clear acceptance criteria. 5 Epics created with 24 user stories covering all in-scope features. Minor deduction for 2 stories with acceptance criteria that could be more specific.
scores.value_reasoning: High-impact customer problems (Search Accuracy, Page Load Speed) addressed in Sprint 1-2. Mobile Experience stories in Sprint 2-3. Deduction for some technical infrastructure stories prioritized ahead of customer-facing search improvements in Sprint 1.

translation_breakdown.reasoning: All requirements broken down into testable stories with INVEST criteria met
Comprehensive coverage; Story 2.4 acceptance criteria could be more specific
Stories capture requirements but Story 3.2 needs edge case clarification
Performance requirements well-translated to actionable technical stories
Mobile requirements comprehensively covered with device-specific acceptance criteria

value_breakdown.reasoning: Top VOC theme prioritized for early delivery with 6 dedicated stories
High priority but some stories (4.1 infrastructure) don't directly deliver visible customer value
Appropriately prioritized but could deliver faster with parallel track

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Refine acceptance criteria for Stories 2.4 and 3.2
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: Add specific test cases and edge case handling to acceptance criteria

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Reorder Sprint 1 to front-load customer-facing search stories
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: Move Story 4.1 (infrastructure) to later in Sprint 1, advance Stories 2.1-2.3

quality_checks.check: All PRD requirements have corresponding stories
quality_checks.details: 24 stories covering all 5 PRD in-scope sections
22/24 stories fully meet INVEST; 2 stories need smaller scope
20/24 stories have fully testable AC; 4 need refinement
All blocking dependencies identified with resolution strategy
Top 2 VOC themes addressed in Sprint 1-2

Current capacity assumptions for sprint sizing
